ygData.subject: RE: Hello
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks. Ask him to loot it.... grin. Then I know if you can do it or not.. Oops you are going to win though are n t you! ... From: Kevin Dailey
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks. Ask him to loot it.... grin. Then I know if you can do it or not..
Oops you are going to win though are n't you!

-----Original Message-----
From: Kevin Dailey [mailto:kevin_dailey@...]
Sent: Friday, August 13, 1999 11:06 AM
To: 'Chas Watkins'
Subject: RE: Hello


We're not looting items in our fights. They are just for ranking within
the guild. The Crush tunic is a Lore item, whatever that means.

Saidinn

-----Original Message-----
From: Chas Watkins [mailto:cwatkins@...]
Sent: Friday, August 13, 1999 12:47 PM
To: Kevin Dailey
Subject: Hello


I replied to your post on the cleric list but I wondered can someone
loot
that crush armor. And with the changes made to Lore items can you put
the
tunic in the bank??


------------------------------------------------------
Chas Watkins
